name: Intro
_source: speak;Kajal;Simon, I understand that you wish to destroy my lord's remains?
speak;Simon;Huh? Where'd you hear that from?
speak;Kajal;Don't try to lie. I heard you and the newcomer talking at the ruins.
speak;Simon;Well, to be honest, that was originally the plan...
speak;Simon;We believed purging the swamp would help the land's monster problem.
speak;Kajal;I understand, but listen to me for a minute.
speak;Kajal;Lord Vesner's miasma is certainly dangerous,{w}{br}and its lack of a strong vessel causes it to spill out and affect the land.
speak;Kajal;Perhaps destruction isn't the only way to resolve this problem, though.
speak;Kajal;If I, as a devoted disciple, reach the tomb and absorb Vesner's power...
speak;Kajal;I may serve as a faithful vessel, and you can rest easy knowing the land is safe.
speak;Simon;I see...{w} I will consider your request.
s;Titus;The moment the Knights and I have been waiting for!
s;Titus;We'll aid you in battle against these fiends.
s;Titus;Let's move up through the mausoleum and destroy Vesner's tomb!
s;Titus;Just get close and demolish his tomb.{w}{br}We'll rid the land of monsters yet!
s;Narrator;The mausoleum's doors open with pressure plates;StyleNid=hint
s;Narrator;If units stand on both pressure plates, the door will open.;StyleNid=hint
s;Narrator;But, if a unit steps off the pressure plate, the door will close again.;StyleNid=hint
